post.text:
A message from Ivanka Trump:
 
"Contribute now and my father will double every dollar you give, up to $2 MILLION, before Wednesday, August 31, at 11:59pm.

https://secure.donaldjtrump.com/august-end-of-month?amount=250&utm_medium=social&utm_campaign=t_djt0831200646_ivanka-video-aug-eom&utm_source=facebook&utm_content=ivanka-video-aug-eom_fb_organic
 
You put in $100, he'll make it $200.
You put in $250, he'll make it $500.
You put in $500, he'll make it $1,000.
 
He'll also send you a personal thank you gift."

comment.author: Jonathan
comment.text: Hi! I'm Jonathan. Please join me and thousands of others uniting to show our support for Donald Trump on election day. Wear red! Bright red! Republican red! Lots and lots of red!!! This movement is spreading like wildfire throughout Facebook. Donald Trump supporters are agreeing by the thousands upon thousands to wear the same color to the polls in November. Imagine a show of unity from the east to the west that just can't be denied. Make our votes visible. Let MSM try to avoid that picture! Join us. Go to Pledge... red... for... Trump (without the...). Find the full Pledge there and copy it to share!

replies.author: Garrett
replies.text: Are you out of your mind?
